Good Comments: Best accuracy alongside with [gg]. I simply prefee [AonE-AnY]'s style.
It's AnimeONE and AnimeYuki all the way, best translations and they are the original group who translated the previous seasons.
Bad Comments: I like honorifics, capitols, enjoyable styling, different colors for multiple speeches and i got all of those in [AonE-AnY] release

Good Comments: Their fonts are large and very legible.
Nice looking and very good tranlated. Love it.
All background signs and background voices subbed for. Translators notes explaining everything, and the subs have very few grammatical errors. Some of the best subbing I've seen!
This is the best fansub group for Ah My Goddess .
Bad Comments: AonE-AnY AMG Season 1 sub was excellent!
Encoding did NOT suck. Smooth playback, and the translator wasn't just some hack. Good use of T/Ns as well.

Good Comments: I like the format they use when subbing multiple people at once.  I also appreciate how they have all signs/ characters subbed with good placement

Bad Comments: Very good, detailed translations, great use of karaoke effects.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Aa! Megami-sama!: Sorezore no Tsubasa Specials

Good Comments: their style and the font for the subs fits the anime
I hardly see how this is 'unprofessional' which is an obvious lie for unknown reasons. Best sub of this out there and there will be no better.
Bad Comments: The opening credits are pretty impressive and don't spoil the mood of the music/show. In reference to the other comments labeling it 'unprofessional' - it's a fan Subtitling group : / what exactly do people expect. they do a great  job!
High quality subs, nice file sizes, regular releases.
